text_blocks.content: MCC NEW YORK SPECIAL HOUSING UNIT 30 MINUTE CHECK SHEET L-TIER DATE: 07/23/2019
A staff member must observe all inmates confined in a continuous locked down status... All observations must be documented.

additional_notes: The document contains handwritten entries in a table format, with some redacted information marked as '(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)'. The document is stamped with 'MCC NEW YORK SPECIAL HOUSING UNIT' at the top left and right corners.
